name: Stone Aged - Caveman Runner In Super Stone Age World
name_original: Stone Aged - Caveman Runner In Super Stone Age World
description:
Welcome to the Jurassic Age Of Dinosaurs where there are no rules. In this endless runner platformer game run and destroy as many Dinosaurs as you can. Collect Coins and become the best runner in Stone Age Town.

Simple game play. Just jump and throw your weapon to hunt Dinosaurs and bring home the bacon for your wife because she is hungry and starving for some food.


Become the best Caveman Ninja Runner in town with reflexes.

HOW TO PLAY

Simply Hit Up Arrow Button To Jump and The Weapon Button At Right Corner Of the Screen To Throw Weapons at Dinos.


FEATURES

GAME CENTER: Achievements & leaderboards

-Destroy and Smash The Enemies with Your Jump Power To Survive in this Smashing and Juicy Madness.

-Exciting and Addictive Action Gameplay just like old school arcade classics.

-Will take you back to your nostalgic days playing 2d 8bit action platformer games in Amiga and Commodore.

- VIBRANT CARTOON STYLE GRAPHICS: Strike, hit and throw your weapons at the habitants of the stone age.

- MUSIC TO SMASH TO: Enjoy the Fun Music During Game Play.

-- COMPETE WITH FRIENDS: Take down as many enemies as you can and Become Number 1 At Leaderboard!
